html: Mark your calendars for Wednesday at 8pm for a Don't Panic! semester kick off! We'll be hanging out and playing some games on backyard.co, so swing on by if you can!
title: Kickoff Game Night

html: Come hear some hiring perspectives tips & what makes a potential candidate stand out!
title: Get Seen: Tips From a Hiring Perspective

html: Your resident web developer board members Alex Rose and Henry Fellerhoff will be going over how to create a good-looking portfolio/resume/personal site. If you recall, our recruiters from the last meeting specifically said that they check portfolio sites in the hiring process, so it is a useful asset to not only have but to help differentiate yourself within a pool of job applicants.
title: How to stand out amongst the crowd: creating a portfolio.

html:
We have a total of 7 positions up for grabs. We made slides summarizing the roles of all these positions, although they definitely overstate how much work you will do on a weekly basis.

You can view that here: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1A493-ZGcYC705pZlOwyEDWU07T4lFSM36jb_d7j723Y/edit?usp=sharing

If you’re interested, apply here (it’s extremely easy and most of the questions are optional): https://forms.gle/JspE7qm1hDWe286G7
title: Board Application Deadline
